name: Space Colors (PermykGames)
description:
Space Colors is an arcade game with lateral controls. This is the first official game made by our full team, MaykG and Perdi. We hope you like the game and have a nice time playing it. If you encounter any bugs or issues, contact us via Instagram.

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/permykgames/

If you want to help the developers, you can donate by clicking on the link at the end of the post (donators' names will be displayed in the credits of our next game).

# Controls:
- Use A to move left.
- Use D to move right.
- Use [Space] to shoot.
- Use the mouse to select between StartGame and Options, and change settings in the options menu.

The quantity of available ammo is constantly displayed under the score, in the middle of the screen.

Music by @ivijfproductions
